Original:
點餐的時候小姐說串烤類除了培根丸以外都沒有⋯本來非常失望🥲
可是每樣上的東西都好吃，我們忍不住問老闆下次什麼時候來可以吃到最多菜色，結果老闆回覆因為串烤類都是外面市售現成，他們覺得沒特色，所以變成市場有什麼好貨就買什麼。這個回答非常可以！幸好我們有問，差點錯怪店家🤣
我覺得店家可以把日後固定會賣的放菜單，每日精選用一塊黑板/白板寫一下，不然沒來過或是沒有問的客人會以為什麼都沒有～
吃過不少居酒屋，這間真的超實惠，價錢公道味道又非常好👍烤天婦羅真的超級好吃，三層肉建議再切薄一點，不然會顯硬。
另外坐吧台會有超多超多驚喜😉
EN:
Miss said when ordering, there was no skewers except bacon pills. I was very disappointed.
But everything is delicious. We can't help asking when the boss can eat the most dishes next time. As a result, the boss responded that because the skewers were baked, they were all available outside. If you have any good goods, you can buy anything.This answer is very good!Fortunately, we asked, almost the wrong shop 🤣
I think the store can write the menu that will be sold in the future, and choose a blackboard/whiteboard daily. Otherwise, there will be no guests who have not been here or not asking.
I have eaten a lot of izakaya. This is really super affordable, the price is fair and very good. It is really delicious. It is recommended to cut a little bit more than three layers of meat, otherwise it will be stiff.
In addition, there will be a lot of surprises when you sit on the bar

Original: 我們兩個人在（暑假）禮拜五的晚上大約6點到這邊用餐，服務人員非常熱情親切，當時包含我們在內有兩組客人。餐廳內部不算大，但環境算是頗為舒適。我們點了野菜沙拉卷、四川風炸雞軟骨、鹽烤三層肉、午魚一夜干、串烤野菜（四季豆）和日式炒烏龍，另外店家招待一盤毛豆，這樣吃起來份量算是相當足夠。其中最讓我驚豔的就是野菜沙拉卷了，首先，它的份量比我們想像的多，再來就是嚐起來非常清爽好入口！另外四川風炸雞軟骨微微帶辣也十分好吃喔！這邊的飲料（包含茶類）也都要付費，但罐裝冷泡茶喝不完可以帶著走這點還蠻不錯的。目前似乎只接受現金付款。
EN: The two of us arrived here at about 6 o'clock in the evening (summer vacation). The service staff was very enthusiastic and kind. At that time, there were two groups of guests including us.The interior of the restaurant is not large, but the environment is quite comfortable.We ordered the wild vegetable Sarah rolls, Sichuan wind fried chicken cartilage, salt grilled three layers of meat, noon fish overnight, skewed wild vegetables (four seasons beans) and Japanese -style fried oolong. Quite enough.One of the most amazing is that the wild vegetables are rolling. First of all, its portion is more than we think, and then it is a very refreshing entrance!In addition, Sichuan wind fried chicken cartilage is also very delicious!The drinks (including tea) here are also paid, but it is pretty good to take this point with canned cold tea.It seems to only accept cash payment.

Original:
飯後無聊出來找地方小酌。烤飯糰，外皮烤的恰到好處，內部飯的味道也很香，料也很豐富。
炒水蓮很新鮮，口感很脆也很下酒。鮭魚生魚片充滿鮭魚的油香，芥末不會死嗆。培根麻丸卷的培根烤的口感焦脆，中間包的類似麻糬的東西吸收了培根油的香氣，搭配起來的口感豐富味道也很充實，大推！烤雞腿串吃的到雞腿肉汁的鮮甜而且不油膩。
Ps：店員們都很賞心悅目
EN:
After a meal, I was bored to find a place to drink.The grilled rice ball, the outer skin is just right, the internal rice taste is also very fragrant, and the ingredients are very rich.
The stir -fried lotus lotus is fresh, the taste is crispy and very wine.Salmon sashimi is full of salmon's oily fragrance, and mustard will not die.Bacon Ma Maru's Bacon roasted taste is crispy, and the similar things in the middle bag absorbed the aroma of bacon oil.The grilled chicken legs are skewed to the sweet and non -greasy chicken leg gravy.
PS: The clerk is very pleasing to the eye

Original:
2022/10/19用餐

1. 廚師均無戴口罩，如果對於疫情有顧慮的人可能要思考一下。

2. 芥末章魚，非常小盤，章魚也很少，賣120元，端上來我以為這是送的，大概2湯匙的量。

3. 明太子雞翅，2隻，皆去骨包明太子，味道還不錯，但很小隻要160元，我無法接受。

4. 串烤類皆功力不夠，豆皮一串40元，非常乾，雞心只有熟沒有焦香，百頁豆腐也乾掉了，沒什麼口感。老實說，老街中的串烤路邊攤比較好吃。

明太子雞肉串以及醬烤雞腿味道尚可，但一個一串80，一個60左右，別間店這個價格是2串更大的。

5. 鮭魚卵手捲，一個120元，上來看到鮭魚卵跟一般不太一樣，沒有一顆一顆的感覺，比較類似糊狀，咬下去發現中間是完全冰的，甚至有碎冰，非常不能接受。

6. 其餘如炒烏龍麵，烤飯糰，這類型主食皆不錯，建議來的話點這些。

本評論僅是個人感想，並不代表所有人，只是覺得需要誠實說出個人經驗避免他人踩雷，以上所說絕無誇大不實。
如果在找居酒屋，林口有別間更優質的。
最後想說，林口人不是盤子，雖然林口物價偏高，但遇到這種店家我們也無法接受，希望店家有心改進，而不是在差評下留一些回嘴無建設性的回覆。
EN:
2022/10/19 Dining

1. Chefs have no masks. If you are concerned about the epidemic, you may think about it.

2. Mustard octopus, very small disk, rare octopus, selling 120 yuan, I thought it was given, about 2 tablespoons.

3. The Chicken Chicken Wings, 2, all go to the bone of the prince. The taste is not bad, but it only takes 160 yuan. I can't accept it.

4. Bringing bakery is not enough. The bean skin is 40 yuan. It is very dry. The chicken heart is only cooked and there is no scorch. The hundred pages of tofu are also killed.Honestly, the skewers in the old street are more delicious.

Ming Prince Chicken skewers and sauce -grilled chicken legs are okay, but one string of 80, one about 60. The price of other shops is 2 strings.

5. Salmon egg scroll, a 120 yuan, seeing salmon eggs is not the same as usual, there is no feeling one by one, which is similar to paste. It is found that the middle is completely ice, and even crushed ice. accept.

6. The rest, such as fried oolong noodles and roasted rice balls, are all good staple foods. If you recommend coming, order these.

This comment is just personal feelings and does not mean everyone. It just feels that it is necessary to say honestly to avoid personal experience to avoid others from stepping on thunder.
If you are looking for izakaya, Linkou is more high -quality.
Finally, I want to say that the Linkou people are not a plate. Although Linkou has a high price, we cannot accept this kind of shop. We hope that the store will have the intention to improve, instead of leaving some no constructive responses in the bad review.

Original:
講在不太行的料理前，身為餐飲業拜託廚師可以把口罩戴好嗎？疫情期間真的很雷，就不問應該是去抽菸回來後有沒有洗手了。

第一次看到居酒屋的酒單只有整支整支在賣，炸物口味單調內容物也單調，炸蝦2隻四季豆2條杏包菇三片以上。烤物就普通遠紅外線烤爐烤出來的東西，跟我在家裡用烤箱烤出來的差不多。明太子山藥大小塊沒關係，但同一塊可以切成左半邊三公分右半邊一公分，是廚師刀工不行還是處理食材不用心啊？

用不用心很多地方感覺得到，除了山藥大小邊，四季豆直接長長一根也沒在管好看不好看，炸物沒有蘿蔔泥解膩……

最後，退一萬步來說，價格、處理的精緻等等都放一邊，手捲加桂冠沙拉真的不能忍！一捲90塊小小兩片鮭魚沒關係，省下來的原價率可以稍微回饋在日式美乃滋上面嗎？錯的不是桂冠沙拉，而是你做的明明是日式手捲啊…

雞湯不錯喝啦，看老闆要不要改賣中式料理勝過僞居酒屋。

Speaking before the disobedience, can the chef as the catering industry take the mask?It was really thunderous during the epidemic, so I didn't ask if I should wash my hands after I went to smoke.

For the first time, I saw that the wine list in izakaya was only sold, and the taste of the fried flavor was monotonous. The fried shrimp 2 beans and 2 paddy mushrooms were more than three pieces.The grilled objects were baked from ordinary far -infrared ovens, which is almost the same as that I was baked in an oven at home.It doesn't matter if the prince yam yam is large and small, but the same piece can be cut into three centimeters on the left half, one centimeter.

I feel that I do n’t have to worry about it. Except for the size of the yam, the four seasons are not good -looking, not good -looking, and the fried materials are not greasy ...

Finally, if you take 10,000 steps, the price, the exquisite processing, etc. are put aside.A volume of 90 pieces of two slices of salmon is okay. Can the original price rate be given back on the Japanese style Miji?The wrong thing is not the laurel salad, but the Japanese -style hand roll ...

Chicken soup is good to drink. Watching the boss should sell Chinese cuisine than the pseudo -izakaya.

Original:
二訪 外帶 評論

今天透過外送平台點了牛舌燒肉雙拼的餐盒，品嚐後讓人驚艷，牛舌烤的恰到好處、厚薄度剛好口感不錯，燒肉偏鹹但調味是我喜歡的那種也沒有肉腥味，份量足夠整個白飯部分被鋪好鋪滿，配菜還有其中一樣是超大顆炸牡蠣配上了淋上（類似BBQ醬！？）的洋蔥絲意外的搭，唯一小小建議是希望如果是同一個人點餐但分成兩張外帶單的話，同樣品項的也能照單將東西分開包，因為兩串雞皮被放在了同一盒，兩袋餐點又是分別給不同人的，後來只能將被放在一起的餐點取捨給其中一個人了😣
___________________________________________
初訪

服務生親切，很有大口吃肉大口喝酒的放鬆氣氛，今天嚐了生蠔五顆只要200元，新鮮又不會太小顆，搭配上頭特調醬料一起吃好吃清爽不膩口，推👍還有不在菜單上的翼板牛，料理的恰到好處，中間粉嫩卻不流血水， 外頭搭上些許胡椒粒再沾上鹽提味，連平常不太敢吃太生牛排的人都吃了好幾塊，剛好又搭上生啤299喝到飽，對於喜愛喝酒的人蠻划算的

Two visit take -out comments

Today, I ordered the beef tongue to roast the meat and the dual lunch box through the delivery platform. After the taste, it is amazing. The beef tongue is just right. The thickness of the thickness is just good. The meaty smell, the weight is enough for the entire rice to be paved, and the side dishes are the same as the large fried oyster with the onion shreds that are drenched (like BBQ sauce!??) I hope that if the same person ordered a meal but divided into two outside orders, the same items can also be packed separately according to the order, because the two series of chicken skin are put in the same box, and the two bags of meals are given to different people, respectively. Well, I can only choose the meal that was placed together to one of them.
__________________________________________
Initial visit

The waiter is kind, and there is a relaxed atmosphere of eating meat and drinking. Today, the five oysters are only 200 yuan, fresh and not too small. There is also the winged cow that is not on the menu. Several pieces, just put on raw beer 299 to drink, it is quite cost -effective for people who like to drink.
